name: RTU GES Location
action: [IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(RTU_Software_Labor_Container2).Row(1).Column(RTU_GES_Location).GetDisplayValue )*>,None)){<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(CE RTU GES Engineer %)*> <*CTX( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*> <*CTX( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(CE RTU GES Engineer %)*> <*CTX( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*> <*CTX( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(CE RTU Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>}[ENDIF]
description: This rule shows/hides GES Eng columns based on RTU GES Location value
